Welcome to iQIYI video, the client is completely free, in order to provide high-quality, high-definition video experience for you, iQIYI video need to use the following features:
•When you use this application, it would establish a data connection which generated traffic fees. It is charged by the network operator, please consult your local network operator for details
•When you use this application, people nearby are watching function will read your GPS location information or network information
•When you use this application, Voice Search function will use the recording feature

resources.string: You have not agree with our Service Agreement

Click for offline viewing. Videos can be played after being cached without internet access.
2.Register iQIYI and loggin for unlimited offline
"No relevant search results Please have a look at videos that iQIYI recommended to you"
In order to solve your problem, please try to submit the problems in the corresponding environment:
We recommend that you use the WLAN to watch videos, you can use the offline caching capabilities, the freedom to watch at your convenience without network.
2.Will watching video reduce your phone bill?
Video service is free, traffic costs generated in the process are charged by the operator.

"First, check the phone's network connection. Do not recommend that you watch the video in the 2G network, network instability may also cause the video can not see. If you have further questions, please do not hesitate to give us feedback"
